text: Las Aventuras del Capitán Piluso en el castillo del terror (The Adventures of Captain Piluso in the Castle of Terror) is a 1963 black-and-white Argentine family comedy film directed by Francis Lauric and written by Humberto Ortiz. The film starred Alberto Olmedo and Humberto Ortiz. ==Cast== *Alberto Olmedo .... Capitán Piluso *Humberto Ortiz .... Coquito *Lalo Hartich *Martín Karadagián *Juan Carlos Barbieri *Ricardo Carenzo *Rodolfo Crespi *José Del Vecchio *Diego Marcote *Aldo Mayo *María Esther Podestá *Semillita *Félix Tortorelli 200px ==Filming location and premiere date== The movie was filmed on location in Buenos Aires and premiered there on December 19, 1963. ==External links== * Category:Argentine films Category:1963 films Category:Argentine black-and-white films Category:Spanish-language films Category:1963 comedy films Category:Argentine comedy films
title: Las Aventuras del Capitán Piluso en el Castillo del Terror
